readable.title: 2565350330_c7f305e7f7
readable.content: A bearded man laying on his back under a large tree . A grey bearded man is sleeping under a tree . A man laying in the grass under a tree . A well dressed man with a cane and a beard , sleeping under a tree in a park . A white haired man lays down his cane and hat and rests next to a tree .
